definition: to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction

sentences.english: Anonymous. " Woodruff introduced the six bottle carton in 1923."
sentences.chinese: 伍德拉夫介绍了六瓶纸箱于1923年。

sentences.english: Shown below are specific features of edge-to-edge holographic CD's.
sentences.chinese: 下面介绍边到边全息图像光盘的具体特征。

sentences.english: This article mainly introduces an improved system of mate-grinding servo valve.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍了经这改进的伺服阀气动配磨系统。

sentences.english: A new thyristor medium-frequency power supply startup circuit is introduced in this article.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种新的晶闸管中频电源启动电路。

sentences.english: The first part: to discuss the main concepts and characteristics of commercial subject.
sentences.chinese: 本文第一章，主要介绍商主体的概念和特征。

sentences.english: More dramatic is the introduction of goal-driven search engine marketing campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 更戏剧性的是，目标驱动的搜索引擎营销活动的介绍。

sentences.english: The development of modified dipped nylon 66 cord and its application were described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍改性锦纶66浸渍帘布的研制与应用情况。

sentences.english: The route and experiments for synthesis of carbazole violet are described in detail.
sentences.chinese: 详细介绍了咔唑紫的合成路线及实验过程。

sentences.english: The geology effect of 3-D seismic exploration in HK area, Jianghan region is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介绍江汉HK地区三维地震勘探的地质效果。

sentences.english: The production processes of nanosilver antibacterial shoe material were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了纳米银抗菌针刺鞋材的生产过程。

sentences.english: By linking Micro-computer and the 721-Spectrophotometre together, the automatic operation of the 721-Spectrophotometre is realized.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了利用微型计算机与721型订光光度汁相联帆。

sentences.english: Four measures of anti-interference are introduced briefly.
sentences.chinese: 最后简单介绍了四种抗干扰措施。

sentences.english: This paper presents a traditional Chinese medical expert consultation system named ZRK82.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一个名为ZRK82的中医专家咨询系统。

sentences.english: Concreting technology for the box girders and construction method for the prestressing system are dealt with as well.
sentences.chinese: 并介绍了箱梁混凝土的浇注工艺及预应力施工的方法。

sentences.english: One springback compensation method for car stamping die surface is narrated.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了汽车冲压模具型面反弹补偿的一种方法。

sentences.english: Objective To explain the diagnosis and treatment of retrobulbar hematoma after baggy eye-plasty.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍眼袋成形术并发球后血肿的诊断和治疗。

definition: to press charges/to file a complaint
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to refer to
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
